name: additional_loan_points
title: Will you be paying points to lower the interest rate on your additional loan?
label: 2nd Loan Points
description: Tell us how many points you plan to pay.
tips: Points are upfront fees paid to lower your interest rate on your second mortgage. Each point costs 1% of your loan amount and typically lowers your rate by 0.25%.
small_print: The decision to pay points on a second mortgage should be carefully evaluated based on your long-term financial goals.

internal.notes: Affects total closing costs and second mortgage payment calculations

additional_loan_points.name: additional_loan_points
additional_loan_points.tooltip: Enter the number of points you'll pay on your second mortgage
